email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for your iron ore shipment from Tubarao to Qingdao.

Details:
- Cargo Size: 180,000 MT
- Incoterm: CIF
- Vessel: PACIFIC TRADER
- Freight Quote: USD 28.50 per MT
- Laycan: Nov 10-15

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
James Lee
Maritrade Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, is there any flexibility in the laycan?

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez
CargoFreight Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

PACIFIC TRADER has a DWT of 205,000 and an LOA of 300m. The laycan is somewhat flexible; we can adjust to Nov 12-17 if needed.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
James Lee
Maritrade Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thanks for the additional info. We are looking at a laytime start date of Nov 12. Can you confirm if this is feasible and provide the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez
CargoFreight Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao - Laytime Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Laytime start date of Nov 12 is confirmed. Demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day.

Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
James Lee
Maritrade Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

The demurrage rate is acceptable, but the freight rate is still a bit high. Can we negotiate the freight rate to USD 27.00 per MT?

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez
CargoFreight Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

We can meet in the middle at USD 27.75 per MT. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
James Lee
Maritrade Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

USD 27.75 per MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez
CargoFreight Inc.

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Booking is confirmed. We will send the final documents shortly.

Best regards,
James Lee
Maritrade Shipping
